text: Ne wosiwosi otsia linjia obweni bubwo khumusikiti kwoluyali. Ne wosiwosi wamuli mulinjie obweni bwenyu eyo akuli (omusikiti oko) kho Abandu bakhaye okhuba nende eshifune khwinywe, halali balia ababii mubo, kho mulabaria tawe, halali murie esie, kho enyoole okhubabeela tsimbabaasi tsianje, khomunyoole okhulunjikha
